snippet: Most black and Hispanic legislators are Democrats, while white legislators are Republicans — a result of political maps drawn and demographic changes started more than a decade ago.
lead_paragraph: Most black and Hispanic legislators are Democrats, while white legislators are Republicans — a result of political maps drawn and demographic changes started more than a decade ago.

headline.main: For Legislators, Race Correlates to Party, Mostly
headline.print_headline: For Legislators, Race Correlates to Party, Mostly
